meaningMnemonic: Inside the <radical>building</radical> is the <radical>Winter</radical> <radical>Cow</radical>. You need to see it, so you go inside. It is deep down in there, and you'll have to <kanji>descend</kanji> to reach it.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>descend</kanji> to the bottom and there it is, the Winter Cow. You walk up to the cow, and it swings its head back to see you. Instead of a cow's face, it's <reading>こう</reading>いち's face.
